attributes.action: cut the strings attached to debt relief. Use your influence to stop the World Bank and IMF imposing harmful economic conditions on indebted countries in return for debt relief
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In return for debt relief countries must privatise services, cut public spending and open up their markets. Conditions imposed by the World Bank and IMF. These strings attached to debt relief are hurting poor people, undermining democracy and delaying vital debt relief. 
The UK must:
-put pressure on the World Bank and IMF to stop these institutions attaching harmful economic conditions
- Extend the UK aid policy of not attaching conditions such as privatisation to debt relief
- Deliver UK debt cancellation without reference to World Bank and IMF conditions
